resources.string:
Hi I'm Sean I'm a Software Engineer with a beautiful and grumpy German Shepherd. I am looking to develop mobile applications and develop a strong skill set in Kotlin and Android Development. 

I have a CS Degree from SIUE and have been professionally developing in Java, JSP's, and Javascript. 

I am learning Kotlin on my own as I find it interesting and I am well acquainted with Java. I will be developing more apps in my spare time. 

One of which is a budgeting "envelope" app and an app for a food delivery/prep service.
